languages.text: {n}Глядя Иеронимусу в глаза, вы ясно понимаете — исповедоваться и каяться нужно ему, а не вам. За слоями набожности и истовости епископ скрывает какую-то тайну, которую носит в себе не один год. Тайну, что гложет его сейчас сильнее, чем когда-либо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Глядя Иеронимусу в глаза, вы ясно понимаете — исповедоваться и каяться нужно ему, а не вам. За слоями набожности и истовости отче скрывает какую-то тайну, которую носит в себе не один год. Тайну, что гложет его сейчас сильнее, чем когда-либо.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя Иеронимусу в глаза, вы ясно понимаете — исповедоваться и каяться нужно ему, а не вам. За слоями набожности и истовости епископ скрывает какую-то тайну, которую носит в себе не один год. Тайну, что гложет его сейчас сильнее, чем когда-либо.{/n}

Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the Reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him stronger than ever.{/n}

Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the Reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你看着希罗尼穆斯的双眼时，你清楚地意识到，应该悔改的人是他，而不是你。在他的虔诚与狂热背后，隐藏着他这么多年来一直不为人知的秘密。此刻，这个阴暗的秘密比以往任何时候都在更强烈地折磨着他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你看着希罗尼穆斯的双眼是，你清楚地意识到，应该悔改的人是他，而不是你。在他的虔诚与狂热背后，隐藏着他这么多年来一直不为人知的秘密。此刻，这个阴暗的秘密比以往任何时候都在更强烈地啃噬着他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目を覗き込むと、告白し悔い改めるべきなのは、あなたではなく彼自身であるという事に気付く。信心深さと熱心さの裏には、司祭が長年抱えてきた秘密が隠されていたのだ。かつてないほど強く司祭を苦しめる秘密が。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目を覗き込むと、告白し悔い改めるべきなのは、あなたではなく彼自身であるという事に気付く。信心深さと熱心さの裏には、司祭が長年抱えてきた秘密が隠されていたのだ。かつてないほど強く司祭を苦しめる秘密が。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al mirar a Hieronymus a los ojos, te queda claro que es él y no tú quien tiene que confesarse y arrepentirse. Oculto tras varias capas de piedad y fervor hay algo que el reverendo ha llevado en secreto durante años. Un secreto que ahora le corroe con más fuerza que nunca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al mirar a Hieronymus a los ojos, te queda claro que es él y no tú quien tiene que confesarse y arrepentirse. Oculto tras varias capas de piedad y fervor hay algo que el reverendo ha llevado en secreto durante años. Un secreto que ahora le corroe con más fuerza que nunca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du Hieronymus in die Augen siehst, wird ganz deutlich, dass nicht etwa du gestehen und bereuen solltest, sondern er. Verborgen hinter Schichten aus Frömmigkeit und Inbrunst liegt ein Geheimnis, das der Reverend seit Jahren mit sich herumträgt. Ein Geheimnis, das jetzt stärker denn je an ihm nagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du Hieronymus in die Augen siehst, wird ganz deutlich, dass nicht etwa du gestehen und bereuen solltest, sondern er. Verborgen hinter Schichten aus Frömmigkeit und Inbrunst liegt ein Geheimnis, das der Reverend seit Jahren mit sich herumträgt. Ein Geheimnis, das jetzt stärker denn je an ihm nagt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque vous plongez votre regard dans celui de Hiéronymus, il vous apparaît clairement que c'est plutôt lui qui devrait se confesser et se repentir. Derrière sa piété et sa ferveur se cache un secret que le révérend garde depuis des années, un secret qui le ronge de l'intérieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque vous plongez votre regard dans celui de Hiéronymus, il vous apparaît clairement que c'est plutôt lui qui devrait se confesser et se repentir. Derrière sa piété et sa ferveur se cache un secret que le révérend garde depuis des années, un secret qui le ronge de l'intérieur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus'un gözlerine baktığında, günah çıkarması ve tövbe etmesi gerekenin sen değil de asıl o olduğunu görebiliyorsun. Muhteremin; inanç ve coşku perdelerinin ardına gizlenmiş, yıllardır içinde taşıdığı bir sırrı var. Belli ki bu sır, içini hiç olmadığı kadar çok kemiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look into Hieronymus's eyes, it is clear to you that he, not you, is the one who ought to confess and repent. Hidden behind layers of piety and fervour is some secret the reverend has been carrying within him for years. A secret that is now gnawing away at him more strongly than ever before.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus'un gözlerine baktığında, günah çıkarması ve tövbe etmesi gereken kişinin sen değil, o olduğunu net bir şekilde görebiliyorsun. Muhterem'in, inanç ve coşku perdelerinin arkasına gizlenmiş, yıllardır içinde taşıdığı bir sır var. Ve bu sır, içini artık her zamankinden daha da çok kemiriyor.{/n}
